name: (Serbian edition) Put kroz azbuku!
description:
Game description:

Platformer where you play as serbian linguist Vuk Karadzic and collect letters.

Current Development Status: DEMO VERSION

Used assets: Tileset Pack by akari21. Huge thanks to him!

Pixel Character Creator v1.1 by Mounir Tohami, great asset as well and,

Invasion2000 font, which had a nice elegancy to it's style.
